Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Relates to posting financial disclosure filings for candidates for statewide elected office or candidate for a member of the legislature
Summary: Relates to posting financial disclosure filings for candidates for statewide elected office or candidates for a member of the legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง73-a, Pub Off L; amd ยง94, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the executive law, in relation to posting financial disclosure filings for candidates for statewide elected office or candidates for a member of the legislature
